footer.tagline: Your dream wedding dress awaits. We create magical moments for your special day.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.lastUpdated: This policy describes how we handle your personal information.

collection.title: Information We Collect
collection.content: When you contact us through our website, we collect the information you provide: your name, phone number, email address, and message. This information is necessary to respond to your inquiry.

usage.title: How We Use Your Information
usage.content: We use your contact information solely to respond to your inquiries and provide information about our services. We do not use your data for marketing purposes without your consent.

sharing.title: Information Sharing
sharing.content: We do not sell or share your personal information with third parties. Your data is used only by our team to communicate with you.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have questions about this policy or wish to delete your data, please contact us through the contact form on our website.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.lastUpdated: By using our website, you agree to the following terms.

usage.title: Website Usage
usage.content: This website is provided for informational purposes about Sapfir Couture wedding salon and our dress collections. You may browse and use the website for personal, non-commercial purposes.

content.title: Content & Copyright
content.content: All images, text, and other content on this website are the property of Sapfir Couture. You may not copy, reproduce, or distribute our content without written permission.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: We strive to keep our website accurate and up-to-date. However, we do not guarantee that all information is complete or error-free. Dress availability and appearance may vary.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: For any questions regarding these terms, please contact us through our website.
